Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

KSP is a lovely game. I've followed its progress from a fledgling alpha to the beast it has become today. It's great to be part of this community and to experience what the future holds for this great simulation game. 

All the best,

Greetings Parane, welcome to the forms!

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-04T04:28:48Z" title="05/04/2015 04:28  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 4, 2015</time> by Newt**
  
Interesting glitch removed

Welcome to the forums, Parane!

Glad to have you join our community. We are generally a friendly and helpful bunch.

Happy landings!
Welcome, and hello! Glad you're on the forums.
